content:
The Day One app offers several features that can help you organize and enhance your journal entries. Let's dive into adding tags and keywords, as well as using the map feature:

**Adding Tags and Keywords:**

1. Open the Day One app and navigate to the entry you want to add tags to.
2. Tap the three horizontal lines (⋯) in the top-right corner of the entry to access the entry menu.
3. Tap "Edit" to enter edit mode.
4. Scroll down to the "Tags" section, which is located below the text editor.
5. Tap the "+" icon next to "Tags" to add a new tag.
6. Type in your desired tag or keyword, and select it from the suggested list or create a new one.
7. Repeat step 6 to add multiple tags or keywords.
8. Tap "Done" to save your changes.

You can also use the "Tags" tab on the bottom navigation bar to view all your tags and keywords. From here, you can:

* Tap a tag to view all entries associated with it.
* Long-press a tag to edit or delete it.
* Use the "Add Tag" button to create a new tag.

**Using the Map Feature:**

1. Open the Day One app and navigate to the entry you want to add a location to.
2. Tap the three horizontal lines (⋯) in the top-right corner of the entry to access the entry menu.
3. Tap "Edit" to enter edit mode.
4. Scroll down to the "Location" section, which is located below the text editor.
5. Tap the "Add Location" button.
6. Use the map to search for a location, or type in the address or name of the place.
7. Select the correct location from the search results.
8. Adjust the location pin to the exact spot you want to mark.
9. Tap "Done" to save your changes.

You can also use the "Map" tab on the bottom navigation bar to view all your location-tagged entries on a map. From here, you can:

* Tap a location pin to view the associated entry.
* Long-press a location pin to edit or delete the location.
* Use the "Filter" button to filter entries by location.

Tips:

* You can add multiple locations to a single entry, which is useful for tracking your daily travels.
* Use the "Auto-Location" feature to automatically add your current location to an entry. This can be enabled in the app's settings.
* Day One also supports GPS coordinates, which can be useful for tracking outdoor activities or adventures.

Now that you know how to add tags and keywords, as well as use the map feature, you can start organizing and enriching your journal entries even further!
